name: The Upside Down
description:
Hey!

This game is a proof of concept made for Weekly Game Jam-123. The theme of the jam was "Same But Different". In this game you use the same mechanics but you can go in the different "Upside Down" to be able to go further.

It's my first game ever, so please write a review and tell me what I could have done better :)

Have fun :)
